summary: Mod adds two new followers located in Morthal
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds two new followers to Skyrim named Vixen and Elena, both of them can be found hanging out in Morthal in the local tavern. Both followers have been given a variety of perks and spells and will level with the player. This is a standalone follower mod so other than Skyrim no other files are required. Vixen and Elena both use vanilla voice types and have UNP bodies, Relationship Dialogue Overall is recommended to get the best out of these or any other follower. Both followers have been tested with EFF.

Location : Morthal Moorsideinn

Marriable : Yes

Essential : Yes

Weight : 50

Installation : Simply install Vixen followers.esp into your data folder along with any meshes and textures.

Uninstallation : Remove Vixen followers.esp and any other files added by this mod

Updates : Face gen data is now in the correct place in the file, thanks to georgejbps for pointing out this error. If you have already downloaded the earlier version of this mod just uninstall the old version and re-install the new version, then this should solve any further face problems.   

Credits:
 UNP body by dimon
Eyes of Beauty by Lograam
Fair Skin Complexion by HHaley
XP32 Maximum Skeleton by XP32
KS Hair Renewal by KS for the hair
Apachii Skyhair by Apachii
Pretty Face by Tktk
author: hooperdragon
